#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Concept =

The project consists of 2 parts:

= Part 1: Console / Daemon =

A set of Python console scripts regularly checks (crontab) the set up bank accounts via HBCI and updates the appropriate transaction database.

If email notification is set up, an email is sent, when a new transaction is detected.

= Part 2: Web interface =

A Django driven web interface shows all your transactions from the database
and lets you do some statistics and such stuff.
